elf.name: Elf
elf.description: Graceful and intelligent, elves are known for their magical prowess and keen senses.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.description: Hardy and resilient, dwarves are renowned for their strength and endurance.

tiefling.name: Tiefling
tiefling.description: Descendants of fiendish bloodlines, tieflings possess an otherworldly presence.

human.name: Human
human.description: Versatile and adaptable, humans are the most common race in the realm.

halfling.name: Halfling
halfling.description: Small but nimble, halflings are lucky and quick on their feet.

half-orc.name: Half-Orc
half-orc.description: Fierce and powerful, half-orcs combine human cunning with orcish strength.
